## RumInitConfiguration.traceContextInjection property

If you set a `traceSampleRate`<!-- -->, to ensure backend services' sampling decisions are still applied, configure the `traceContextInjection` initialization parameter to sampled.  sampled See <a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/real_user_monitoring/platform/connect_rum_and_traces/?tab=browserrum">Connect RUM and Traces</a> for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
traceContextInjection?: TraceContextInjection | undefined;
```
